paper_metadata.extraction_summary: Extracted information on the TTR gene variant Val30Met, including penetrance data and individual patient details.

individual_records.evidence_sentence: In Sweden, nine homozygous patients from eight families carrying the ATTR mutation Val30Met... have been identified.

functional_data.summary: The mutation Val30Met is associated with amyloid formation leading to neuropathic symptoms.

variants.segregation_data: Yes, all patients are homozygous for the mutation.
variants.additional_notes: All identified patients were homozygous for the Val30Met mutation.
key_quotes: Homozygosity for the mutation associated with FAP, ATTR Val30Met, does not implicate a more severe phenotype for Swedish patients.

extraction_metadata.notes: All relevant data extracted from the main text.
